DESCRIPTION:
This is a 5cl bottling.
The Snow Polo Edition is the 3rd in the series and draws inspiration from the grandeur and style of the sport. The tournament is a spectacle of breath-taking scenes, from the landscape of majestic snow-capped mountain to the sophisticated surroundings. 
A fitting tribute to the purity of the snow, graceful spirit of the game and elegance of the backdrop, Roya Salute's Snow Polo Edition is the result of 21 years maturation in high-quality oak casks.

NAME: Glenallachie - 15 Year Old 2004 #6213 UK Exclusive
DESCRIPTION:
Built and founded in 1967, The GlenAllachie malt whisky distillery was overseen by Mackinlay McPherson. A few years later in 1985 it was bought and mothballed by Invergordon Distillers. 1989 saw it bought by Campbell Distillers who looked to breathe new life into it. Its most recent history sees the master Billy Walker at the helm with Graham Stevenson and Trisha Savage by his side. Famous for their single cask releases and their sherried expressions, this distillery is one of the most exciting ones of modern times.
Distilled in 2004, this bottling of Glenallachie was matured for 15 years and was bottled in August 2019, yielding 354 bottles.

NAME: Glenrothes - 12 Year Old - SMWS 30.112 - Umami Heaven! + Glass
DESCRIPTION:
Founded in Edinburgh in 1983 by Phillip 'Pip' Hills comes The Scotch Malt Whisky Society. His passion for whisky started when he was travelling around the country in the 70s. After which, it took his little time to purchase his first cask with a group of friends. Many years later the syndicate was purchased by Glenmorangie PLC.
From the Speyside region of Scotland, this single malt was distilled at Glenrothes and matured for 12 years after being distilled on 6th June 2007 in a 1st fill Spanish Oak Sherry Butt. One of only 608 bottles.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 5 Year Old - Octomore 09.1 - Dialogos
DESCRIPTION:
October 9.1 sets the tone for the 9 series. Distilled in 2012 from 100% Scottish barley, the 09.1 is matured full-term in top-tier ex-American whiskey casks.
Octomore 9 series has been named dialogos (dialogue in ancient Greek) in recognition of the whisky's ability to provoke debate amongst whisky enthusiasts.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 12 Year Old - 2007 - Micro Provenance #3668
DESCRIPTION:
Bruichladdich unique Micro-Provenance series is as a series of single cask bottlings, released exclusively online.
This is a limited edition of just 300 individually numbered bottles.  It was matured in Virgin Oak cask #3668. distilled in December 2007,  it was then bottled in over 12 years later in November 2019 at 63.8% ABV.

NAME: Springbank - 15 Year Old - Rum Wood (Limited Edition)
DESCRIPTION: This is a limited edition, single malt Scotch whisky from Springbank distillery bottled and released in 2019.  The whisky was fully matured in rum casks for 15 years.   Bottled at a cask strength of 51.0% this is one of only 9,000 bottles released worldwide.

NAME: Springbank - 14 Year Old - Gleann Mor
DESCRIPTION:
This bottling of Springbank was distilled on 27th November 1998 and bottled 14 years later on 14th February by independent bottler Gleann Mor.
One of 229 bottles. Cask #448.

NAME: Bowmore - 15 Year Old - Distillery Excluisve - Fèis Ìle 2019
DESCRIPTION:
This is one of Bowmore's Fèis Ìle distillery exclusive releases of 2019.  It was created through a marriage of some of their finest bourbon casks.  The 15 year old single malt has notes of oak spice and bergamont balanced with the sweetness of candied orange shortbread.  This is one of 3000 individually numbered bottles.
This is bottle number 25.

NAME: Bruichladdich - Octomore 06.1 - 5 Year Old - Scottish Barley
DESCRIPTION: One of the world’s most heavily peated whiskies, at 167ppm, this is the 6th edition of the very experimental Octomore. This sixth edition was branded 'Scottish Barley'.

NAME: Cameronbridge Distillery - 27 Year Old - Old Particular
DESCRIPTION: Part of the Elements Collection by Old Particular (Douglas Laing) this bottle from Cameronbridge Distillery was distilled in October 1991, this single grain scotch whisky is a limited release of only 232 bottles. The natural cask strength of this malt was bottled at 56.6% ABV coming from a refill hogshead cask before being bottled 27 years later in Feburary 2019.

NAME: Caol Ila - 12 Year Old - Feis Ile 2017
DESCRIPTION:
A 12 year old Caol Ila bottled for the 2017 Feis Ile.  This limited edition was double matured in Amoroso Cask Wood and was bottled at cask strength of 55.8%. This is one of 1,500 individually numbered bottles.
 
This is bottle mumber 4.

NAME: Chivas - 21 Year Old - Royal Salute - Snow Polo Edition (5cl)
DESCRIPTION:
This is a 5cl bottling.
The Snow Polo Edition is the 3rd in the series and draws inspiration from the grandeur and style of the sport. The tournament is a spectacle of breath-taking scenes, from the landscape of majestic snow-capped mountain to the sophisticated surroundings. 
A fitting tribute to the purity of the snow, graceful spirit of the game and elegance of the backdrop, Roya Salute's Snow Polo Edition is the result of 21 years maturation in high-quality oak casks.

NAME: Highland Park - 15 Year Old - Single Cask #3374 - Loch Fyne Whiskies
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Loch Fyne Whiskies.  Distilled in 2002, this single malt was matured for 15 years in refill butt #3374 at the cask strength of 58.4% ABV.  With only 584 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Highland Park - 15 Year Old - Single Cask #3374 - Loch Fyne Whiskies
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Loch Fyne Whiskies.  Distilled in 2002, this single malt was matured for 15 years in refill butt #3374 at the cask strength of 58.4% ABV.  With only 584 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask #2634 - Arlanda Airport
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Arlanda Airport.  Distilled in 2005, this single malt was matured for 12 years in Refill Hogshead #2634 and bottled at the cask strength of 62.4% ABV.  With only 275 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Highland Park - 14 Year Old - Single Cask Series Viking Soul #2544
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park is known for being the most Northern Scotch Whisky Distillery in the world. It is situated on the outskirts of the biggest town in Orkney 58.9847°N. It is so far North it is almost in the Arctic circle. To give you an idea, it is on the same latitude as Anchorage, Alaska.
The distillery has been distilling in the same site since 1798 where the founder, Magnus Eunson’s, original illicit still was at High Park.
They smoke their own barley from over 4,000 year old peat which has been cut from the Hobbister Moor only seven miles from the distillery.
Highland Park 14 Year Old is part of the single cask series by the Island Distillery.
Distilled on 2002, matured in a first fill European sherry puncheon and bottled in 2016 at the natural cask strength of 59.9%.
This is one of just 648 bottles exclusively produced for people with Viking Soul.

NAME: Highland Park - 15 Year Old - Single Cask #2154 - The Whiskey House
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for The Whiskey House.  Distilled in 2003, this single malt was matured for 15 years in First Fill American Sherry Butt #2154 at the cask strength of 61.8% ABV.  With only 606 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Bowmore - 15 Year Old - Distillery Excluisve - Fèis Ìle 2019
DESCRIPTION: This is one of Bowmore's Fèis Ìle distillery exclusive releases of 2019.  It was created through a marriage of some of their finest bourbon casks.  The 15 year old single malt has notes of oak spice and bergamont balanced with the sweetness of candied orange shortbread.  This is one of 3000 individually numbered bottles.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 14 Year Old - Elementa (1L)
DESCRIPTION: This spicy and deep Elementa celebrates Glenmornagie's skills in wood finishing, an art which brings new depths of flavour to their whisky. Matured initially in American oak bourbon casks to create smoothness and fruity notes and finished in charred oak casks, bringing forth a 14-year-old whisky of woody depth and intense spice.  Available exclusively in travel retail.

NAME: Ardbeg Blaaack - Committee 20th Anniversary - Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION: This release marks the 20th anniversary of the Ardbeg Committee, with the release also timed for Ardbeg Day 2020.  Ardbeg Blaaack 20th Anniversary limited edition was matured in New Zealand Pinot Noir casks.

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old #6120 2004 Valletta
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park is known for being the most Northern Scotch Whisky Distillery in the world. It is situated on the outskirts of the biggest town in Orkney 58.9847°N. It is so far North it is almost in the Arctic circle. To give you an idea, it is on the same latitude as Anchorage, Alaska.
The distillery has been distilling in the same site since 1798 where the founder, Magnus Eunson’s, original illicit still was at High Park.
They smoke their own barley from over 4,000 year old peat which has been cut from the Hobbister Moor only seven miles from the distillery.
Distilled in 2004 and bottled in 2018 this 13 year old was bottled exclusively for Valletta. It comes from cask #6120 and was matured in a Refill Puncheon.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 12 Year Old - 2004 Cask Exploration Valinch #13
DESCRIPTION:
A Port Charlotte 2004 vintage matured for 12 years in Bourbon/Monbazillac cask #12/202-27.  Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 21 Smachd Air Caileachd. One of 438 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.
This is bottle number 095.

NAME: Glenlossie - 12 Year Old - Manager's Dram (2004)
DESCRIPTION:
A rare Glenlossie 12 Year Old bottled November 2004 at 55.5% volume.
The Manager’s Dram series of whiskies were bottled exclusively for employees of what is now known as Diageo. These whiskies were selected by the respective distillery managers within Diageo malt distilling and bottled at natural cask strength.
Bottle 1443.

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old - Single Cask #5715 - Grundtvig
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Grundtvig. This is edition 1 in the Founders series.  Distilled in 2003, this single malt was matured for 13 years in refill butt #5715 at the cask strength of 61.3% ABV.  With only 624 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Ardbeg Blaaack - Committee 20th Anniversary - Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION: This release marks the 20th anniversary of the Ardbeg Committee, with the release also timed for Ardbeg Day 2020.  Ardbeg Blaaack 20th Anniversary limited edition was matured in New Zealand Pinot Noir casks.

NAME: Highland Park - RNLI Stromness Lifeboat
DESCRIPTION:
This is a special Highland Park release, bottled to commemorate the 150th anniversary of the first RNLI lifeboat being launched at Stromness on Orkney in 1987.
To mark the bravery and dedicated service of the RNLI, Highland Park released exactly 1,867 anniversary bottles in January 2018.  Since the Severn class lifeboat stationed in Stromness is 55.9 feet long, they bottled this special edition of Highland Park at 55.9% ABV.
This is one of 1,867 bottles.

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old - Single Cask #6313 - Helluland
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Helluland.  Distilled in 2003, this single malt was matured for 13 years in Refill Puncheon #6313 then bottled at the cask strength of 61.3% ABV.  With only 510 bottles available, this is an extremely limited edition.

NAME: Ardbeg Blaaack - Committee 20th Anniversary - Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION: This release marks the 20th anniversary of the Ardbeg Committee, with the release also timed for Ardbeg Day 2020.  Ardbeg Blaaack 20th Anniversary limited edition was matured in New Zealand Pinot Noir casks.

NAME: Ardbeg - Auriverdes
DESCRIPTION: This special edition Ardbeg single malt was released on Ardbeg Day 2014. during Feis Ile.  Auri(Gold) verdes (Green) it refers to the golden whisky and the iconic Ardbeg green bottle of Ardbeg whisky.  It is said to be a dram of two halves -  the whisky uses toasted cask lids to create Mocha Coffee flavours that team up with creamy vanilla.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 14 Year Old - Elementa (1L)
DESCRIPTION: This spicy and deep Elementa celebrates Glenmornagie's skills in wood finishing, an art which brings new depths of flavour to their whisky. Matured initially in American oak bourbon casks to create smoothness and fruity notes and finished in charred oak casks, bringing forth a 14-year-old whisky of woody depth and intense spice.  Available exclusively in travel retail.

NAME: Ardbeg Blaaack - Committee 20th Anniversary - Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION: This release marks the 20th anniversary of the Ardbeg Committee, with the release also timed for Ardbeg Day 2020.  Ardbeg Blaaack 20th Anniversary limited edition was matured in New Zealand Pinot Noir casks.

NAME: Caol Ila - 2007 Cask Strength - Distillery Only
DESCRIPTION:
This cask strength Caol Ila, was released only at the distillery shop in 2017.
3000 bottles were made available and bottled at their natural cask strength.

NAME: Ardbeg Blaaack - Committee 20th Anniversary - Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION: This release marks the 20th anniversary of the Ardbeg Committee, with the release also timed for Ardbeg Day 2020.  Ardbeg Blaaack 20th Anniversary limited edition was matured in New Zealand Pinot Noir casks.

NAME: Ardbeg Blaaack - Committee 20th Anniversary - Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION: This release marks the 20th anniversary of the Ardbeg Committee, with the release also timed for Ardbeg Day 2020.  Ardbeg Blaaack 20th Anniversary limited edition was matured in New Zealand Pinot Noir casks.

NAME: Ardbeg Blaaack - Committee 20th Anniversary - Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION: This release marks the 20th anniversary of the Ardbeg Committee, with the release also timed for Ardbeg Day 2020.  Ardbeg Blaaack 20th Anniversary limited edition was matured in New Zealand Pinot Noir casks.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask #6551 - San Diego
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for San Diego.  Distilled in 2004, this single malt was matured for 12 years in First Fill European Sherry Oak Butt #6551 and bottled at the cask strength of 65.6% ABV.  With only 294 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Jim Beam - Beam Listed NYSE
DESCRIPTION:
Jim Beam released this special bottling to mark the date and celebrate the company being listed on the New York Stock Exchange.
This event took place on October 4th 2011 and is most certainly one for the collectors.

NAME: Bunnahabhain - Dràm An Stiùreadair - Feis Ile 2014
DESCRIPTION:
This very limited edition peated Bunnahabhain was released especially for Fèis Ìle 2014.  Matured in Bourbon casks for 9 years, it then spent a final year in a Marsala wine cask.  This is one of just 632 bottles.
Bottle 452.

NAME: Macallan - Classic Cut - 2018
DESCRIPTION:
The Macallan Classic Cut - 2018 edition is the second release in the limited annual series.  It was matured exclusively in hand-picked oloroso sherry oak casks from Jerez, Spain, before being bottled at 51.2% ABV.
It celebrates Macallan's ongoing commitment to seek out the extraordinary and create whiskies of unique character.  This single malt offers a whisky with dominant sweetness with balanced flavours.

NAME: Highland Park - 15 Year Old - Fire
DESCRIPTION: This stunning Highland Park 15 year old single malt follows the 'Ice' edition to complete this Highland Park two-part series. The 'Fire' edition celebrates Muspelheim, the glowing Norse fire realm of destruction.  The malt was matured in refill Port casks and bottled at 45.2% abv. It's presented in a cradle shaped like a mountain.

NAME: Auchentoshan - 21 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
One of the older bottlings from the Lowland distillery. 
This is a 21 year old expression from Glasgow's Auchentoshan distillery.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 1990 Valinch 'The Purest Whisky in Scotland'
DESCRIPTION:
A 1990 vintage cask strength valinch in celebrating three Bruichladdich bottlings being blind-tasted and statistically analysed and found to zero ratings for undesirable impurities or off-flavours of any kind - the only three to do so of 350 whiskies tasted. 
Distilled on 16th February 1990 and matured in refill bourbon cask #710 and bottled at  55.5%.
This is one of 350 50cl bottlings.
This is bottle 110.

NAME: Caol Ila - 1993 Distillers Edition (2006)
DESCRIPTION:
Caol Ila Distillers Edition was laid down in 1993 and subsequently bottled in 2006 after being matured in a Moscatel cask wood.
This edition has a deep, sweet and smoky flavour that suggests the intense, saturated colours of late afternoon sunshine after a storm has passed.
ID - C-si; 1-465

NAME: Highland Park - 14 Year Old Single Cask #3376 Distillery Exclusive
DESCRIPTION:
An Orkney favourite in this Highland Park single cask which has been matured for 14 years in Refill Butt #3376.
582 bottles were produced from this cask at the natural cask strength of 57.8%.

NAME: Highland Park - Single Cask Series -Taiwan Duty Free Exclusive #5708
DESCRIPTION: This 13 Year Old Highland Park was bottled as a Taiwan Duty-Free Exclusive release.  It is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series.  Distilled in 2003, the single malt was matured in refill butt #5708 for 14 years and was bottled in 2017 at 61.1% ABV.  This a limited release of just 600 bottles.

NAME: Glenfarclas - 8 Year Old (1980s)
DESCRIPTION: Glenfarclas 8 year old single malt whisky from the 1980s. From the heart of Speyside, this little tipple is a great talking point. 75cl bottling.

NAME: Highland Park - RNLI Stromness Lifeboat
DESCRIPTION:
This is a special Highland Park release, bottled to commemorate the 150th anniversary of the first RNLI lifeboat being launched at Stromness on Orkney in 1987.
To mark the bravery and dedicated service of the RNLI, Highland Park released exactly 1,867 anniversary bottles in January 2018.  Since the Severn class lifeboat stationed in Stromness is 55.9 feet long, they bottled this special edition of Highland Park at 55.9% ABV.
This is one of 1,867 bottles.

NAME: Macallan - 12 Year Old - Fine Oak - Year of the Dog (1 x 70cl)
DESCRIPTION:
With bespoke label designs, this is an eye-catching limited-edition release twin pack containing 1 x 70cl bottles of The Macallan 12-year-old Double Cask single malt whisky.
The bottles and the presentation box feature artwork celebrating Chinese New Year 2018 (the year of the Dog), the eleventh in the 12-year cycle of the zodiac.
The beautiful illustration is also inspired by the incredible story behind The Macallan’s exceptional oak casks and the extraordinary journey that takes the oak from the forest floor to the distillery in Scotland
There is only 1 x 70cl in this duo pack included in this lot.

NAME: Old Pulteney - 2006 Single Cask #1917
DESCRIPTION:
This single cask of Old Pulteney was distilled in 2006.  Bottled in 2020 at cask strength from a hand-selected American oak ex-bourbon cask no. 1917.  This is one of just 282 bottles produced. Matured by the sea, this is another super 'Maritime Malt'.
This is bottle number 086.

NAME: Ardbeg - Drum - 2019 Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION:
This is the 2019 Ardbeg Drum Limited edition.  The Ardbeg Drum is a non-age-statement single malt matured in ex-Bourbon casks and then finished in ex-rum casks from the Americas.  It was created to celebrate Ardbeg Day 2019 (June 1) held during the Islay Festival of Music & Malt (Fèis Ìle).
This limited-edition is bottled at 46% abv.

NAME: Royal Brackla - 21 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This expression was oldest of trio of Royal Brackla single malts launched in 2015 as part of the Last Great Malts from John Dewar & Sons. Matured in Oloroso Sherry casks and bottled at 40%.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 10 Year Old 2009 - Micro Provenance #1613
DESCRIPTION:
Bruichladdich's unique Micro-Provenance series is as a series of single cask bottlings.
This 10-year-old is a limited edition of just 294 individually bottles. It was matured in a second fill France Rivesaltes. Distilled on 7th May 2009 and bottled on 21st January 2020.

NAME: Aultmore - 18 Year Old - Foggie Moss
DESCRIPTION:
This bottle is a 18 year old from the Aultmore distillery.
It has an exceptionally smooth, clean and fruity taste which comes from the courtesy of the gorse- and heather-filtered waters of the Foggie Moss and malted barley free from peat smoke.
It was bottled at 46%.

NAME: Wolfburn - 4 Year Old Vibrant Stills
DESCRIPTION:
Holding the title as the most Northern distillery in the UK (until recently), this distillery is on the North Coast 500 in Thurso. If you have not been already, you really should make the effort. They are forward-thinking and couldn't possibly be more friendly! The first distillation from this distillery took place in Jan 2013 only 350m away from the previous site. 
This release is one of the very first single malt for Wolfburn distillery. The malt was matured in cask #152, #153 and #154 which were all laid down in July 2015.

NAME: Cambus - 28 Year Old - Batch 11 - That Boutique-y Whisky Co.
DESCRIPTION:
This bottling from That Boutique-y Whisky Co. is 28 year old whisky from the closed Cambus distillery, and it's full of vanilla, boiled sweetie and baking spices notes.  Batch 11 is a release of 435 bottles.
This is bottle number 9.

NAME: Bruichladdich - Infinity 1st Edition
DESCRIPTION: There are three different releases from Bruichladdich titled the Infinity collection. This is the first releases in the series.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old (Old Style)
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park 12 year old - one of the best malts in the world year on year. This bottling has been in its core range for over 100 years. This design of bottle was used by Highland Park from 1999-early 2000s.
This classic 1990s bottling was said to be whisky author Michael Jackson’s favourite tipple.

NAME: Kilchoman - 2008 Single Sherry Cask #642 Founders Cask Release
DESCRIPTION:
Bottled in 2019 this is A Founders Cask release from Kilchoman.
This is a 5 part series of single casks where they have all been selected by a member of the Wills family. They own the distillery and are making a great impact on the whisky community. 
Cask #642 was a sherry cask and was filled on 4/12/2008.
A limited-edition and only 643 bottles were produced. 
Bottle 180 of 643.

NAME: Highland Park - RNLI Stromness Lifeboat
DESCRIPTION:
This is a special Highland Park release, bottled to commemorate the 150th anniversary of the first RNLI lifeboat being launched at Stromness on Orkney in 1987.
To mark the bravery and dedicated service of the RNLI, Highland Park released exactly 1,867 anniversary bottles in January 2018.  Since the Severn class lifeboat stationed in Stromness is 55.9 feet long, they bottled this special edition of Highland Park at 55.9% ABV.
This is one of 1,867 bottles.

NAME: Highland Park - 2002 15 Year Old - Single Cask #1937 / WoW Switzerland 20th
DESCRIPTION:
A 15-Year-Old 1992 vintage single cask Highland Park, bottled for World of Whisky (WoW) Switzerland's 20th anniversary in 2018.
Matured in cask #1937 - 1st fill sherry oak puncheon - for 15 years, then bottled at the cask strength of 61%. This is a limited release of just 570 bottles.

NAME: Ardbeg - Auriverdes
DESCRIPTION: This special edition Ardbeg single malt was released on Ardbeg Day 2014. during Feis Ile.  Auri(Gold) verdes (Green) it refers to the golden whisky and the iconic Ardbeg green bottle of Ardbeg whisky.  It is said to be a dram of two halves -  the whisky uses toasted cask lids to create Mocha Coffee flavours that team up with creamy vanilla.

NAME: Arran - Malt and Music Festival 2015
DESCRIPTION:
One of only 386 bottles produced this is the 2015 release for the Malt and Music festival on Arran. It so great to see distilling happening on the island again after there was virtually no activity in the 19th and 20th centuries. The revived distillery was opened in 1995 and bottled their first single malt in 1998.
This bottling was distilled on the 1st August 2005 in French oak barrique cask #2005/22 before being bottled on the 3rd of June 2015 at 59% ABV.
 
This is bottle number 47.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask #2634 - Arlanda Airport
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Arlanda Airport.  Distilled in 2005, this single malt was matured for 12 years in Refill Hogshead #2634 and bottled at the cask strength of 62.4% ABV.  With only 275 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Balvenie - 15 Year Old Single Barrel #2026
DESCRIPTION:
This bottle is one of no more than 800 bottles drawn from the single cask number 2026. Matured in a European Oak Sherry Butt for at least 15 years before being selected by David Stewart, the Balvenie Malt Master. 
This is bottle number 396.

NAME: Bimber - Peated Cask - Small Batch #1
DESCRIPTION:
One of only 1750 bottles in the Bimber Peated Cask Batch 1 Small Batch release. It was firstly matured in 1st fill bourbon barrels then finished in casks that previously held Ex-peated Quarter Casks to finish.
The batch number for this bottling is 01/2020 which was bottled on 30th July 2020.

NAME: Highland Park - RNLI Stromness Lifeboat
DESCRIPTION:
This is a special Highland Park release, bottled to commemorate the 150th anniversary of the first RNLI lifeboat being launched at Stromness on Orkney in 1987.
To mark the bravery and dedicated service of the RNLI, Highland Park released exactly 1,867 anniversary bottles in January 2018.  Since the Severn class lifeboat stationed in Stromness is 55.9 feet long, they bottled this special edition of Highland Park at 55.9% ABV.
This is one of 1,867 bottles.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask Series - London Gatwick and World Duty Free
DESCRIPTION:
This Highland Park 12 Year Old was distilled in 2005 and bottled from a single refill butt #1140 in 2017 exclusively for London Gatwick and World Duty Free.
This is one of 540 bottles released as part of the Highland Park Single Cask Series.

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old - Single Cask #2865 - Draken (75cl)
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Draken (USA).  Distilled in 2005, this single malt was matured for 13 years in Refill Sherry Butt, then bottled at the cask strength of 64.3% ABV.  With only 444 bottles available, this is an extremely limited edition.

NAME: Glengoyne - Cask Strength - Batch #1
DESCRIPTION: This is the very first edition of Glengoyne Cask Strength that was first released in 2012. A combination of first-fill sherry-matured whisky and refill-matured malt resulted in a very flavourful bottling. Bottled at the cask strength of 58.7%.

NAME: Highland Park - Hillhead (Keystone Series, Part 5)
DESCRIPTION: 'Hillhead' bottled at 46% ABV, marries both flavour and strength and was matured in three casks: European Oak Sherry, American Oak Sherry and American Oak Bourbon.  Hillhead was the last in a series of five special editions, showcasing Highland Park's five keystones of production.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 16 Year Old - The Tribute (1L)
DESCRIPTION: Created exclusively for travel retail, 16-year-old this bottling pays homage to the lightly peated whisky of Glenmorangie’s past. Aged in American oak bourbon casks for smoothness.

NAME: Bunnahabhain - 2008 - Moine French Oak Finish - Fèis Ìle 2019
DESCRIPTION:
This is one of three releases by Bunnahabhain for the 2019 Fèis Ìle.
This single malt was distilled on the February 2008 and was matured for 11 years - it was finished in French Oak before it was bottled at 57.4% ABV in February 2019.  This is a limited edition release of only 1872 bottles produced.
Bunnahabhain is generally regarded as the lighter of the Islay whiskies, although the Moine releases are their heavily peated spirit. This particular example has been finished in French Oak casks.
 
This is bottle number 0236.

NAME: Bunnahabhain - 2007 Port Pipe - Limited Release
DESCRIPTION: This Bunnahabhain limited release was distilled in 2007 and was aged in Warehouse 8 for 11 years.  Initially matured in whisky refill hogshead casks and then filled into port pipes in 2016 for a final 2 years of maturation. It was bottled at 55.3% ABV.  This is one of 1578 bottles produced.

NAME: Bunnahabhain - 18 Year Old Small Batch
DESCRIPTION: Bunnahabhain 18 Year Old is part of their core range and it packs a punch! You will go a long way to find a dram with more depth.

NAME: Highland Park - RNLI Stromness Lifeboat
DESCRIPTION:
This is a special Highland Park release, bottled to commemorate the 150th anniversary of the first RNLI lifeboat being launched at Stromness on Orkney in 1987.
To mark the bravery and dedicated service of the RNLI, Highland Park released exactly 1,867 anniversary bottles in January 2018.  Since the Severn class lifeboat stationed in Stromness is 55.9 feet long, they bottled this special edition of Highland Park at 55.9% ABV.
This is one of 1,867 bottles.

NAME: Box - The Festival 2015
DESCRIPTION: The Box Whisky The Festival 2015 was made available exclusively to attendees at the Box Whisky Festival.  This is one of 700 bottles produced from 10 bourbon barrels (100-130 L), and finished in two fresh American Oak casks and in two fresh Swedish Oak casks.  In addition, one fresh American Oak cask (100L) was used.

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old - Single Cask #2865 - Draken (75cl)
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Draken (USA).  Distilled in 2005, this single malt was matured for 13 years in Refill Sherry Butt, then bottled at the cask strength of 64.3% ABV.  With only 444 bottles available, this is an extremely limited edition.

NAME: Signatory Vintage 1996 - 19 Year Old - Inchmurrin
BOTTLER: Signatory Vintage Scotch Whisky Co. Ltd.
DESCRIPTION: This bottle has been distilled at Inchmurrin Distillery 1996 in a refill butt cask for 19 years. It is bottle number 86 and was bottled in 2015.

NAME: Mortlach - 18 Year Old (50cl)
DESCRIPTION:
A quality release in 2014 from The Beast of Dufftown after being matured for 18 yearsbottling in sherry and refill American oak casks.
The distillery is also an integral part of Diageo's Johnnie walker.

NAME: Laphroaig - 10 Year Old - Original Cask Strength Batch #010
DESCRIPTION:
This original cask strength bottling of the medicinal 10 year old from Islay's bestselling distillery, Laphroaig.  In making Laphroaig, malted barley is dried over a peat fire.  The smoke from this peat, found only on Islay, gives Laphroaig its particularly rich flavour.
Batch #10 was bottled at 58% in Jan 18.

NAME: Caol Ila - 10 Year Old - Fèis Ìle 2018
DESCRIPTION: The 2018 Fèis Ìle release from east coast legends Caol Ila was a 10 year old expression was aged in a combination of rejuvenated European oak butts and refill American hogsheads.

NAME: Ardbeg - Drum - 2019 Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION:
This is the 2019 Ardbeg Drum Limited edition.  The Ardbeg Drum is a non-age-statement single malt matured in ex-Bourbon casks and then finished in ex-rum casks from the Americas.  It was created to celebrate Ardbeg Day 2019 (June 1) held during the Islay Festival of Music & Malt (Fèis Ìle).
This limited-edition is bottled at 46% abv.

NAME: Laphroaig - 10 Year Old - Original Cask Strength Batch #009
DESCRIPTION:
This original cask strength bottling of the medicinal 10 year old from Islay's bestselling distillery, Laphroaig.  In making Laphroaig, malted barley is dried over a peat fire.  The smoke from this peat, found only on Islay, gives Laphroaig its particularly rich flavour.
Batch #009 was bottled at 58.1% in February 2017.

NAME: Ardbeg - Drum - 2019 Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION:
This is the 2019 Ardbeg Drum Limited edition.  The Ardbeg Drum is a non-age-statement single malt matured in ex-Bourbon casks and then finished in ex-rum casks from the Americas.  It was created to celebrate Ardbeg Day 2019 (June 1) held during the Islay Festival of Music & Malt (Fèis Ìle).
This limited-edition is bottled at 46% abv.

NAME: Kilchoman - 2011 Port Cask Matured
DESCRIPTION: The first release of port-cask-matured single malt by Kilchoman. Distilled in 2011, it was matured in ex-ruby-port casks and bottled in August 2014.

NAME: Royal Brackla - 21 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This expression was oldest of trio of Royal Brackla single malts launched in 2015 as part of the Last Great Malts from John Dewar & Sons. Matured in Oloroso Sherry casks and bottled at 40%.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 19 Year Old - Finest Reserve
DESCRIPTION: Released for travel retail in 2017, Glenmorangie 19-Year-Old Finest Reserve was matured for 19 years in selected American white oak bourbon casks before it was bottled at 43% ABV.

NAME: Dewars - Signature
DESCRIPTION:
Dewar's Signature is a blended Scotch Whisky, this bottle is a fitting testament to Thomas Dewar's extraordinary pioneering spirit, reputation and achievements.  
Comes in a lovely presentation box.
This is bottle number A16291.

NAME: Aberfeldy - 21 Year Old - Project Spirit V3 Release
DESCRIPTION:
From the eastern highlands, this award-winning malt was pretty much removed from everyone's thoughts, that was until it was bought over by Bacardi. Aberfeldy has a highly rated visitor centre which opened at the turn of the millennium and attracts over thirty thousand visitors a year.
This is limited edition bottling is in recognition of the successful GO LIVE of Project Spirit V3 on the 10th April 2012. It is an exclusive bottling usif casks specially selected for the occasion by John Dewar's Master Blender Stephanie Macleod. There is only 900 bottles.
 
This is bottle number 217.

NAME: Bunnahabhain - 9 Year Old Lady of the Glen 2010
DESCRIPTION: Selected and bottled by independent bottler Hannah Whisky Merchants - Lady of the Glen from Scotland.  Distilled in November 2010 and matured in Oloroso sherry hogshead  901203 until January 2020, when it was bottled at the cask strength of 66.7% ABV. This is one of just 325 bottles produced.

NAME: Johnnie Walker - Premier
DESCRIPTION: Johnnie walker Premier was blended from some very rare whiskies in the Johnnie Walker inventory. A selection of the whisky included in this blend is from closed distilleries. This is a 75cl bottling.

NAME: Compass Box - Flaming Heart (2018)
DESCRIPTION: This the 2018 limited edition bottling of Flaming Heart blended malt by Compass Box.  It is smokey and delicious and said to have notes of Caol Ila, Clynelish and Deanston and more.  This is one of 15,050 bottles released and 800 magnums - bottled in June 2018.

NAME: Bunnahabhain - 11 Year Old - 2007 French Brandy Cask
DESCRIPTION:
Most of the whisky coming from the distillery prior to 2012 was lightly peated. However, in 2012 a change was to come...
Approximately 20% of production contains 35-45ppm peat.
A limited release from warehouse number 8 and distilled in 2007. This beauty is finished in a French Brandy Cask. Bottled in 2019.

NAME: Ardbeg - Perpetuum - Bicentenary Release
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg Perpetuum Distillery Release was launched in 2015 in memory of the 200th anniversary of the Islay distillery.
Perpetuum is actually a blend of old and young whisky which has been matured in both Bourbon and Sherry casks.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 17 Year Old - XVII
DESCRIPTION: This 17-year-old Bruichladdich was released in 2004, by the previous owners of the distillery.  It was matured in first-fill American oak casks.

NAME: Highland Park - Single Cask Series -Taiwan Duty Free Exclusive #6311
DESCRIPTION: This 14 Yea Old Highland Park was bottled as a Taiwan Duty Free Exclusive release.  It is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series.  Distilled in 2003, the single malt was matured in refill puncheon #6311 for 14 years and was bottled in 2017 at 60.6% ABV.  This a limited release of just 510 bottles.

NAME: Ledaig - 18 Year Old Sherry Cask Finish Batch #2
DESCRIPTION:
A peated expression that has been aged for 18 years.
This Ledaig was produced at Tobermory distillery and has been finished in a Spanish sherry wood.
Batch #2 of these limited releases.

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old - Single Cask #1765 - Amsterdam Airport
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Amsterdam Airport.  Distilled in 2005, this single malt was matured for 13 years in refill butt #1765 and was bottled at a cask strength of 63.4% ABV.  With only 471 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Glenrothes - 1992 - 2004
DESCRIPTION: Distilled in 1992 an bottled in 2004 this single malt from Speyside has a fruity taste with lingering notes of liquorice.

NAME: Askaig - 13 Year Old 1982 The Master Of Malt
DESCRIPTION:
A 13 year old single malt bottled exclusively for The Master Of Malt. 
Previously sold for £105.00 in 2016. A rare find!

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old - Single Cask #6324 - Sisu
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Sisu.  Distilled in 2003, this single malt was matured for 13 years in Refill puncheon #6324 at the cask strength of 60.2% ABV.  With only 390 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: James Martin's -  20 Year Old - Fine & Rare
DESCRIPTION: This bottling was created from very limited stocks laid down 20 years ago. Blended and bottled in Scotland.

NAME: Highland Park - 15 Year Old - Single Cask #1674 - Vintersolstandet
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Vintersolstandet. Distilled in 2001, this single malt was matured for 15 years in refill butt #1674 at a cask strength of 59% ABV.  With only 552 bottles available, this is a very limited edition.

NAME: Bunnahabhain - 6 Year Old SMWS 10.190 Feis Ile 2020
DESCRIPTION:
Founded in Edinburgh in 1983 by Phillip 'Pip' Hills comes The Scotch Malt Whisky Society. His passion for whisky started when he was travelling around the country in the 70s. After which, it took his little time to purchase his first cask with a group of friends. Many years later the syndicate was purchased by Glenmorangie PLC.
Bottled for the Feis 2020 festival that was unfortunately cancelled due to COVID 19. This is one of only 616 bottles. From a Moine cask, the title of this bottling is "Make Moine A Devil!".

NAME: Balblair - 1999 Vintage 2014 2nd Edition
DESCRIPTION:
One of the not only the Highland distilleries but all of Scotlands distilleries, Balblair is owned by Inverhouse. 
Moving with the times, Balblair has also changed from oil to gas to reduce its carbon footprint. 
This is, of course, the new packaging that has been redesigned and is part of the annual vintage series. It was distilled in 1999 and bottled in 2014.

NAME: Highland Park - Single Cask #6204 - Runa (25th Anniversary)
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for the 25th Anniversary of Runa. Distilled in 2004, this single malt was matured for 13 years in refill butt #6204 and bottled at the cask strength of 62% ABV.  With only 618 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Highland Park - Single Cask Series -Taiwan Duty Free Exclusive #4303
DESCRIPTION: This 13 Year Old Highland Park was bottled as a Taiwan Duty-Free Exclusive release.  It is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series.  Distilled in 2004, the single malt was matured in refill butt #4303 for 14 years and was bottled in 2017 at 63.1% ABV.  This a limited release of just 624 bottles.

NAME: Caol Ila - 1993 Distillers Edition (2006) 1L
DESCRIPTION:
Caol Ila Distillers Edition was laid down in 1993 and subsequently bottled in 2006 after being matured in a Moscatel cask wood.
This edition has a deep, sweet and smoky flavour that suggests the intense, saturated colours of late afternoon sunshine after a storm has passed.
ID - C-si; 1-465
This is a 1L bottling.

NAME: Ardbeg - Perpetuum - Bicentenary Release
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg Perpetuum Distillery Release was launched in 2015 in memory of the 200th anniversary of the Islay distillery.
Perpetuum is actually a blend of old and young whisky which has been matured in both Bourbon and Sherry casks.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask Series - London Gatwick and World Duty Free
DESCRIPTION:
This Highland Park 12 Year Old was distilled in 2005 and bottled from a single refill butt #1140 in 2017 exclusively for London Gatwick and World Duty Free.
This is one of 540 bottles released as part of the Highland Park Single Cask Series.

NAME: Glengoyne 17 - Presentation Decanter
DESCRIPTION: This 17-year-old Glengoyne presentation decanter, estimated to be from the 1990s.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask Series - Juhlaviski #1536
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park 12 Year Old is part of the single cask series by the Island Distillery.
Matured in a first fill European Oak Sherry Puncheon and bottled in 2016.
Distilled in 2004 this release was limited to 636 bottles for  Juhlaviski - Onnittelut 100-Votiaalle Suomelle Orkneyn Saarelta.

NAME: Ardbeg - Perpetuum
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg Perpetuum Distillery Release was in 2015 in memory of the 200th anniversary of the Islay distillery.
Perpetuum is actually a blend of old and young whisky which has been matured in both Bourbon and Sherry casks.

NAME: Cambus - 28 Year Old Càrn Mòr 1991 - Celebration of the Cask
DESCRIPTION:
From Càrn Mòrs strictly limited range, this bottling is presented in their new style of packaging. 
Distilled on 8th August 1991 this bottle of Cambus was bottled by Morrison and Mackay whisky merchants. Only 515 bottles were produced from sherry butt cask #61976 when bottled in 29th April 2019.
This is bottle number 367.

NAME: Highland Park - Viking Collection - 1997 The Sword
DESCRIPTION: This is a rare 1997 vintage release of Highland Park single malt that was released as part of the Viking Collection. It was originally bottled for Taiwan and the distillery shop.

NAME: Laphroaig - 15 Year Old - 200th Anniversary Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION: This limited release 15-year-old Laphroaig single malt was bottled to commemorate Laphroigs 200th Anniversary.  To mark their bicentenary they brought back their 15-Year-Old for a limited edition release.  Laphroaig 15 Year Old was first released in the 1980s, but it was eventually replaced with the Laphroaig 18 Year Old.

NAME: Bunnahabhain - 2008 - Moine French Oak Finish - Fèis Ìle 2019
DESCRIPTION:
This is one of three releases by Bunnahabhain for the 2019 Fèis Ìle.
This single malt was distilled on the February 2008 and was matured for 11 years - it was finished in French Oak before it was bottled at 57.4% ABV in February 2019.  This is a limited edition release of only 1872 bottles produced.
Bunnahabhain is generally regarded as the lighter of the Islay whiskies, although the Moine releases are their heavily peated spirit. This particular example has been finished in French Oak casks.
 
This is bottle number 1610.

NAME: Kilchoman - 11 Year Old 2007 Bourbon Barrel Feis Ile 2018
DESCRIPTION:
The 2018 Feis offering from Kilchoman.
This bottling from Kilchoman was distilled in March 2007 and bottled for Feis Isle 2018. The whisky was aged in bourbon barrels 34, 65, 82 and 83. 
At the time of this bottlings release this was one of the oldest expressions Kilchoman had ever done.

NAME: Wolfburn - Lest We Forget - poppyscotland
DESCRIPTION:
A limited edition from Wolfburn Distillery to commemorate the 100th anniversary of the end of The First World War.  A total of 1918 bottles were produced and sold exclusively from the distillery and through the Carnegie Whisky Cellars in Dornoch.  This project is important to both companies and was proposed to Wolfburn Distillery due to the owners of Wolfburn being former British Servicemen and the importance of the Poppy Appeal to all service personnel and their families.
It's a lightly peated single malt, featuring a small portion of the whisky drawn from sherry casks, and has been bottled at 46% ABV.

NAME: Ardbeg - Perpetuum - Bicentenary Release
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg Perpetuum Distillery Release was launched in 2015 in memory of the 200th anniversary of the Islay distillery.
Perpetuum is actually a blend of old and young whisky which has been matured in both Bourbon and Sherry casks.

NAME: Ardbeg - Drum - 2019 Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION:
This is the 2019 Ardbeg Drum Limited edition.  The Ardbeg Drum is a non-age-statement single malt matured in ex-Bourbon casks and then finished in ex-rum casks from the Americas.  It was created to celebrate Ardbeg Day 2019 (June 1) held during the Islay Festival of Music & Malt (Fèis Ìle).
This limited-edition is bottled at 46% abv.

NAME: Laphroaig - Cairdeas Madeira Cask - (2016)
DESCRIPTION:
Cairdeas, Gaelic for 'friendship', is an annual bottle release by Laphroaig for their Friends of Laphroaig members. 
This bottling was originally aged in ex-bourbon barrels before being re-casked in Madeira seasoned traditional hogsheads. It was bottled at 51.6% ABV.

NAME: Kirk and Sweeney - 23 Year Old Rum
DESCRIPTION:
From the Caribean nation that is best known for its beaches and golfs resorts...and now its Rum. 
This cracking 23 year old comes from an undisclosed Dominican distillery. 
Batch: 006
This is bottle number 2042.

NAME: Laphroaig - Cairdeas Madeira Cask - (2016)
DESCRIPTION:
Cairdeas, Gaelic for 'friendship', is an annual bottle release by Laphroaig for their Friends of Laphroaig members. 
This bottling was originally aged in ex-bourbon barrels before being re-casked in Madeira seasoned traditional hogsheads. It was bottled at 51.6% ABV.

NAME: Waterford - Single Farm Origin - Ballykilcavan 1.1
DESCRIPTION: Ballykilcavan 1.1 is one of the first releases from the Waterford Distillery's Single Farm Origin series. Made exclusively using Taberna barley grown by David Walsh-Kemmis on his Ballykilcavan farm in Co. Laois. After distillation, the whiskey is matured in a combination of French and American oak, and then bottled at 50% ABV.

NAME: Ardbeg - Drum - 2019 Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION:
This is the 2019 Ardbeg Drum Limited edition.  The Ardbeg Drum is a non-age-statement single malt matured in ex-Bourbon casks and then finished in ex-rum casks from the Americas.  It was created to celebrate Ardbeg Day 2019 (June 1) held during the Islay Festival of Music & Malt (Fèis Ìle).
This limited-edition is bottled at 46% abv.

NAME: Highland Park - 18 Year Old (Signed Limited Edition)
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Parks last batch of the 18 Year Old single malt before the new packaging of the 18 Year Old Viking Pride.
756 bottles were hand signed by Whisky Makers Max McFarlane and Gordon Motion.

NAME: Dewars - Signature
DESCRIPTION:
Dewar's Signature is a blended Scotch Whisky, this bottle is a fitting testament to Thomas Dewar's extraordinary pioneering spirit, reputation and achievements.  
Comes in a lovely presentation box.
This is bottle number R145878.

NAME: Aberfeldy - 1989 - G & M Connoisseurs Choice
DESCRIPTION: This Aberfeldy Single Malt was distilled in September 1989 in refill sherry hogsheads. It was bottled in October 2007 by Gordon & MacPhail for their Connoisseurs Choice range.

NAME: Ledaig - 18 Year Old Sherry Cask Finish Batch #2
DESCRIPTION:
A peated expression that has been aged for 18 years.
This Ledaig was produced at Tobermory distillery and has been finished in a Spanish sherry wood.
Batch #2 of these limited releases.

NAME: Clynelish - 12 Year Old Friends of the Classic Malts 2009
DESCRIPTION: Bottled especially for the Diageo "Friends Of The Classic Malts," range.  Distilled at Clynelish before being bottled in 2009 as a 12-year-old expression.

NAME: Ardbeg - Perpetuum - Bicentenary Release
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg Perpetuum Distillery Release was launched in 2015 in memory of the 200th anniversary of the Islay distillery.
Perpetuum is actually a blend of old and young whisky which has been matured in both Bourbon and Sherry casks.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 2008 Valinch 10 Year Old - MAC:01
DESCRIPTION: From Bruichladdich, this Port Charlotte Valinch single cask is an 10 year-old distilled in Islay in 2008, matured in Maderia cask #3836.  This is a distillery exclusive release of 411 bottles, bottled at 62.6% ABV.  This is a 50cl bottling.

NAME: Caol Ila - 10 Year Old - Fèis Ìle 2018
DESCRIPTION: The 2018 Fèis Ìle release from east coast legends Caol Ila was a 10 year old expression was aged in a combination of rejuvenated European oak butts and refill American hogsheads.

NAME: Bunnahabhain - 2008 - Moine French Oak Finish - Fèis Ìle 2019
DESCRIPTION:
This is one of three releases by Bunnahabhain for the 2019 Fèis Ìle.
This single malt was distilled on the February 2008 and was matured for 11 years - it was finished in French Oak before it was bottled at 57.4% ABV in February 2019.  This is a limited edition release of only 1872 bottles produced.
Bunnahabhain is generally regarded as the lighter of the Islay whiskies, although the Moine releases are their heavily peated spirit. This particular example has been finished in French Oak casks.

NAME: Bimber - Ex-bourbon - Small Batch #1
DESCRIPTION:
One of only 1948 bottles in the Bimber Ex-bourbon Batch 1 Small Batch release. It was firstly matured in 1st fill bourbon barrels. 
The batch number for this bottling is 01/2020 which was bottled in May 2020. 
 
This is bottle number 1221.

NAME: Aberlour - 20 Year Old Distillery Reserve Collection #9057
DESCRIPTION:
This Aberlour 20 Year Old single malt was released as part of the Distillery Reserve Collection. These single cask bottlings were exclusively available at Chivas Brothers distilleries.
Aged for 20 years in cask Number 9057 this first fill sherry was eventually bottled on the 19th of July 2018. Bottled at cask strength. 
Only 1056 bottles were produced from this cask.

NAME: Glen Moray - 18 Year Old SMWS 35.265 Meditiation Medication + Glass
DESCRIPTION:
Founded in Edinburgh in 1983 by Phillip 'Pip' Hills comes The Scotch Malt Whisky Society. His passion for whisky started when he was travelling around the country in the 70s. After which, it took his little time to purchase his first cask with a group of friends. Many years later the syndicate was purchased by Glenmorangie PLC.
From the Speyside region of Scotland, this single malt was distilled at Glen Moray and matured for 18 years after being distilled on 2nd November 2001 in a 1st refill ex bourbon barrel. One of only 181 bottles.

NAME: Old Perth - 12 Year Old - 2004
DESCRIPTION: A 12 year old blended malt from Morrison & MacKay's Old Perth range.  This is one of 666 bottles produced.  This blend is a combination of malt whisky from Macallan and Highland Park, drawn from a single cask.

NAME: Waterford - Single Farm Origin -  Bannow Island 1.1 & Bannow Island 1.2
DESCRIPTION: This lot contains 2 x 70cl

NAME: Port Charlotte - 2007 Valinch 11 Year Old - BC:02
DESCRIPTION: From Bruichladdich, this Port Charlotte Valinch single cask is an 11 year-old distilled in Islay in 2007, matured in 1st fill bourbon barrel #1410.  This is a distillery exclusive release of 337 bottles at 62% ABV.  This is a 50cl bottling.

NAME: Waterford - SFO - Bannow Island &  Ballykilcavan 1.2
DESCRIPTION:
This lot includes 2 x 70cl bottlings:
Ballykilcavan: Edition 1.2 – the second release, uses barley grown by David Walsh-Kemmis west of the Barrow in Co. Laois in the barley heartlands, where his fertile fields are sheltered by ancient woodland. Bottled at 50% ABV without colouring, chill-filtration or any additives.
Bannow Island: Edition 1.2 - the second Bannow Island release by Waterford. Now 3 months older, this expression is from barley grown by Ed Harpur on the extreme southern coast of Co. Wexford, where salt-laden Atlantic winds and sandy soils create a unique, if challenging, terroir.

NAME: Laphroaig - 15 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: A smart old bottle of Laphroaig, bottled in the mid to late 1990s, after the award of the Royal Warrant in 1994. Laphroaig 15 Year Old is smoother than the robust 10-year-old.

NAME: Balblair - 19 Year Old - Art of Whisky
DESCRIPTION:
This bottling has matured for at least 19 years in finest oak wood. Distilled at Balblair distillery in the North of the Highlands. The air in Edderton on the Dornoch Firth is said to be The Purest in Scotland. Bottled at cask strength of 55.9% ABV by independent bottlers Elixir Distillers.
"Art of Whisky" The application of creative skill and imagination to produce a liquid to be appreciated for its beauty, complexity and emotional power.

NAME: Lagavulin - 11 Year Old  - Offerman Edition
DESCRIPTION:
Lagavulin Offerman Edition is an 11-Year-Old, limited edition released as a tribute to Nick Offerman. Nick Offerman was known for his woodcraft skills and putting it to good use building his own boats. 
Lagavulin chose this dram for a reason, it comes from American white oak casks, a direct reflection of his passion.

NAME: Glenmorangie - Sherry Wood Finish
DESCRIPTION: After initially maturing in American Oak cask, this Glenmorangie was then allowed a special finishing period in selected sherry 'butts'.  The sherry finish has made this Glenmorangie extra special.  The wood finish range was discontinued in Summer 2007.

NAME: Glenrothes - 2006 Single Cask #5465 UK Exclusive​ Batch #1
DESCRIPTION:
Distilled in 2006, this bottling is from the first batch of UK Exclusive single cask series from Glenrothes. 
Single cask #5465 yielded 605 bottles and was released in 2017.

NAME: Highland Park - 14 Year Old - Single Cask #2118 - Edinburgh Airport and World of Whiskies
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Edinburgh Airport and World Duty-Free.  Distilled in 2003, this single malt was matured for 14 years in ex-sherry refill butt #2118 at a cask strength of 59.9% ABV.  With only 300 bottles available, this is an extremely limited edition.

NAME: Talisker - 15 Year Old - 2019 Special Release
DESCRIPTION: From Diageo's Special Release 2019 series comes this 15-Year-Old Talisker single malt. Matured in freshly charred American oak hogsheads and bottled at the natural cask strength of 57.3%.

NAME: The Winter Queen - 9 Year Old - Adelphi
DESCRIPTION:
A 7 Year Old blend that is a fusion from Longmorn and Glenrothes Distilleriies in Scotland and malt whisky from Zuidam Distillery in the Netherlands. As a majestic tribute this bottling was called The Winter Queen to tribute the remarkable Scot. 
This is one of 866 bottles.

NAME: Caol Ila - 1993 Distillers Edition (2006) 1L
DESCRIPTION:
Caol Ila Distillers Edition was laid down in 1993 and subsequently bottled in 2006 after being matured in a Moscatel cask wood.
This edition has a deep, sweet and smoky flavour that suggests the intense, saturated colours of late afternoon sunshine after a storm has passed.
ID - C-si; 1-465
This is a 1L bottling.

NAME: Ardbeg - Ardbeg Day Feis Ile 2012 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg always has an annual Feis Ile bottling and this little beauty was released on 1st June 2012.
12,000 were produced and married in ex refill sherry casks.
Available at the distillery and online to committee members.
This is a 5cl bottling.

NAME: Macallan - Edition No.5
DESCRIPTION: The fifth release in the Edition Series from The Macallan, The Macallan Edition No. 5 celebrates The Macallan’s extensive natural colour spectrum and the intricate whisky-making process, in partnership with masters at the Pantone Color Institute™ to create a unique shade of purple that features on the packaging.

NAME: Highland Park - Single Cask Series -Taiwan Duty Free Exclusive #4303
DESCRIPTION: This 13 Year Old Highland Park was bottled as a Taiwan Duty-Free Exclusive release.  It is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series.  Distilled in 2004, the single malt was matured in refill butt #4303 for 14 years and was bottled in 2017 at 63.1% ABV.  This a limited release of just 624 bottles.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 10 Year Old - 2004 Cask Exploration #04
DESCRIPTION: A Port Charlotte 2004 vintage matured for 10 years in cadiz cask #1248. Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 04 Sraid A'Chladaich. One of 414 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.

NAME: Highland Park - Single Cask Series -Taiwan Duty Free Exclusive #6311
DESCRIPTION: This 14 Yea Old Highland Park was bottled as a Taiwan Duty Free Exclusive release.  It is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series.  Distilled in 2003, the single malt was matured in refill puncheon #6311 for 14 years and was bottled in 2017 at 60.6% ABV.  This a limited release of just 510 bottles.

NAME: Macallan - Edition No.5
DESCRIPTION: The fifth release in the Edition Series from The Macallan, The Macallan Edition No. 5 celebrates The Macallan’s extensive natural colour spectrum and the intricate whisky-making process, in partnership with masters at the Pantone Color Institute™ to create a unique shade of purple that features on the packaging.

NAME: Scapa - 14 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This 14 Year Old from Scapa Distillery was a shortlived bottling -it was introduced by Chivas Brothers to replace the old 12 Year Old, but was subsequently replaced by their 16 year old standard official bottling.

NAME: Highland Park - 11 Year Old - Single Cask #3720 - Munich Airport
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Munich Airport.  Distilled in 2006, this single malt was matured for 11 years in refill butt #3720 was bottled at the cask strength of 64.5% ABV.  With only 324 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Lagavulin - 2001 Distillers Edition 2017
DESCRIPTION:
Lagavulin 2001 Distillers Edition was double matured and was bottled in 2017 at 43% ABV.  Lagavulin is the most sought after bottling of the Distiller’s Edition range.
Batch No. lgv.4/506

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old - Single Cask Series Germany #6353
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park 13 Year Old is part of the single cask series by the Island Distillery.
Matured in a first fill European Sherry Hogshead and bottled in 2016.
Distilled in 2002 this release was limited to 318 bottles exclusively produced for GERMANY.

NAME: Highland Park - 1988 Gordon & Macphail 2013
DESCRIPTION:
Arguably the most famous independent bottler of Scotch whisky there is. Gordon & MacPhail was founded in Elgin in 1895 by James Gordon and John Alexander MacPhail. It is now owned by the Urquhart Family who have bow bottled over 350 different expressions from around 69 different distilleries. Gordon & MacPhail is the Trading name of Speymalt Whiskies while also owning the Benromach distillery, which they purchased in 1993. Some of the brands include Connoisseurs Choice, Cask Strength, Rare Old and Speymalt.
This release comes from the Island of Orkney and was distilled at Highland Park distillery in 1988 and bottles in 2013. It comes under their Macphails collection label.

NAME: Ardbeg - 10 Year Old 5cl (with Hip Flask)
DESCRIPTION:
This gift set includes a 5cl bottling of Ardbeg 10 Year Old and Ardbeg Hip Flask.
Ardbeg Ten Year Old is known around the world as the peatiest, smokiest, most complex single malt of them all. Yet it does not flaunt the peat; rather it gives way to the natural sweetness of the malt to produce a whisky of perfect balance. Named World Whisky of the Year in 2008.
Produced on the Kildalton Coast of Islay, this single malt matures for a decade before being bottled without any chill-filtration with a strength of 46% ABV.

NAME: Caol Ila -  Cask Strength  2007 - Distillery Only
DESCRIPTION: A very impressive cask strength Caol Ila launched at the Islay Festival in 2007, this was sold exclusively at the distillery shop.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old (Old Style)
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park 12 year old - one of the best malts in the world year on year. This bottling has been in its core range for over 100 years. This design of bottle was used by Highland Park from 1999-early 2000s.
This classic 1990s bottling was said to be whisky author Michael Jackson’s favourite tipple.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask Series - 58 Albert Street
DESCRIPTION: This 12 year old single malt was distilled 200, matured in Refill Butt number 1791 and bottled in 2017, as part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series.  This limited edition of just 540 bottles, was released to celebrate the opening of 58 Albert Street, Kirkwall.

NAME: Highland Park - RNLI Stromness Lifeboat
DESCRIPTION:
This is a special Highland Park release, bottled to commemorate the 150th anniversary of the first RNLI lifeboat being launched at Stromness on Orkney in 1987.
To mark the bravery and dedicated service of the RNLI, Highland Park released exactly 1,867 anniversary bottles in January 2018.  Since the Severn class lifeboat stationed in Stromness is 55.9 feet long, they bottled this special edition of Highland Park at 55.9% ABV.
This is one of 1,867 bottles.

NAME: Highland Park - 2002 15 Year Old - Single Cask #1937 / WoW Switzerland 20th
DESCRIPTION:
A 15-Year-Old 1992 vintage single cask Highland Park, bottled for World of Whisky (WoW) Switzerland's 20th anniversary in 2018.
Matured in cask #1937 - 1st fill sherry oak puncheon - for 15 years, then bottled at the cask strength of 61%. This is a limited release of just 570 bottles.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask Series - London Gatwick and World Duty Free
DESCRIPTION:
This Highland Park 12 Year Old was distilled in 2005 and bottled from a single refill butt #1140 in 2017 exclusively for London Gatwick and World Duty Free.
This is one of 540 bottles released as part of the Highland Park Single Cask Series.

NAME: Box - The Festival 2017
DESCRIPTION:
The Box Whisky The Festival 2017 was made available exclusively to attendees at the Box Whisky Festival.  A Swedish single malt whisky produced at the High Coast Distillery.  This is one of 1000 bottles.
 
This is bottle number 392.

NAME: Waterford - Single Farm Origin - Bannow Island 1.2
DESCRIPTION: Bannow Island 1.2 is one of the first releases from the Waterford Distillery's Single Farm Origin series. This single malt Irish whisky was distilled using a single vintage of Overture barley grown on the south coast of Co. Wexford by Ed Harpur on his Bannow Island farm.  Matured in French and American oak casks, and bottled at 50% ABV with no chill-filtration or additional colouring.

NAME: Kilchoman - 2009 Fino Sherry Finish Feis Ile 2014
DESCRIPTION:
A twin cask release#328 and #329 for Feis Ile 2014 by Kilchoman distillery in 2014. The casks were filled on 1st July 2009 and finished in Fino casks prior to being bottled on the 20th May 2014.
This is one of only 525 bottles.

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old - Single Cask #5709 - Kaupang
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled as Kaupang.  Distilled in 2003, this single malt was matured for 13 years in Refill Butt #5709 at the cask strength of 59.7% ABV.  With only 552 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Waterford - SFO - Bannow Island &  Ballykilcavan 1.2
DESCRIPTION:
This lot includes 2 x 70cl bottlings:
Ballykilcavan: Edition 1.2 – the second release, uses barley grown by David Walsh-Kemmis west of the Barrow in Co. Laois in the barley heartlands, where his fertile fields are sheltered by ancient woodland. Bottled at 50% ABV without colouring, chill-filtration or any additives.
Bannow Island: Edition 1.2 - the second Bannow Island release by Waterford. Now 3 months older, this expression is from barley grown by Ed Harpur on the extreme southern coast of Co. Wexford, where salt-laden Atlantic winds and sandy soils create a unique, if challenging, terroir.

NAME: Waterford - Single Farm Origin - Bannow Island & Ballykilcavan 1.1
DESCRIPTION:
Ballykilvan 1.1 is one of the first releases from the Waterford Distillery's Single Farm Origin series. Made exclusively using Taberna barley grown by David Walsh-Kemmis on his Ballykilcavan farm in Co. Laois. After distillation, the whisky is matured in a combination of French and American oak, and then bottled at 50% ABV
Bannow Island 1.1 is also one of the first releases from the Waterford Distillery's Single Farm Origin series. This single malt Irish whisky was distilled using a single vintage of Overture barley grown on the south coast of Co. Wexford by Ed Harpur on his Bannow Island farm.  Matured in French and American oak casks, and bottled at 50% ABV with no chill-filtration or additional colouring.

NAME: Macallan - Edition No.5
DESCRIPTION: The fifth release in the Edition Series from The Macallan, The Macallan Edition No. 5 celebrates The Macallan’s extensive natural colour spectrum and the intricate whisky-making process, in partnership with masters at the Pantone Color Institute™ to create a unique shade of purple that features on the packaging.

NAME: Scapa - 10 Year Old 2006 - Single Cask  2173
DESCRIPTION: This single cask edition from Scapa distillery was distilled on the 23rd November 2006.  It was then bottled from a single first fill, sherry butt on the 9th of May 2017.  This is one of only 888 bottles, which were only originally available to purchase from the distillery.

NAME: Glengoyne - Scottish Oak Finish
DESCRIPTION: This cask strength Glengoyne has been finished for just over three months in Scottish Oak casks.

NAME: Wolfburn - Lest We Forget - poppyscotland
DESCRIPTION:
A limited edition from Wolfburn Distillery to commemorate the 100th anniversary of the end of The First World War.  A total of 1918 bottles were produced and sold exclusively from the distillery and through the Carnegie Whisky Cellars in Dornoch.  This project is important to both companies and was proposed to Wolfburn Distillery due to the owners of Wolfburn being former British Servicemen and the importance of the Poppy Appeal to all service personnel and their families.
It's a lightly peated single malt, featuring a small portion of the whisky drawn from sherry casks, and has been bottled at 46% ABV.

NAME: Wolfburn - Kylver Series Limited Edition-  3rd Release
DESCRIPTION:
Still clinching onto the title of the most Northern distillery on the mainland UK, Wolfburn has exploded back into the whisky scene in 2013. 
This series "Kylver" is named after an ancient burial stone. This third release is possibly the most anticipated yet and means thorn or grant. 
It has been matured in a combination of ex-bourbon barrels and hogsheads before being bottled in 2017.
Label: A commissioned Thurisaz in Repose by Ian Giles.

NAME: Mars - Fubuki (2018) - Taiwan Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION:
This is a blended whisky produced by Mars Whisky, the owners of the Mars Shinshu distillery and the recently-opened Mars Tsunuki distillery. A Taiwan exclusive, introduced at the Chateau Kuva Whisky Expo in Taiwan in September 2018. This is one of just 1500 bottles.  It was matured in American white oak and bourbon barrels. 
'Fubuki' translates as 'snow storm', and refers to the naturally melted snow that contributes to the high-quality water that is used to produce this whisky.

NAME: Blanton’s - Single Barrel Bourbon Original #88 93Proof
DESCRIPTION:
Without chill-filtration or additional colouring, this bottling was drawn from a single bourbon barrel.
Blanton's are known for their top-quality bourbon and this bottling is no different.  
Blanton's Single Bourbon is normally 6 to 8-year-old bourbon, aged in Warehouse H at Buffalo Trace in the metal-clad warehouse at the distillery. The metal, transfers heat quicker than brick warehouses, allowing for faster ageing.
This comes from barrel number 88 and stored on rick number 32.
This is bottle number 39.

NAME: Hazelburn - 8 Year Old - First Edition - The Stills
DESCRIPTION:
This lot has an 8 year bottle of Hazelburn which is a triple distilled, completley unpeated single malt produced at Campeltown's Springbank Distillery. To celebrate the First Release Hazelburn, Springbank Distillers Ltd commissioned artist Ian Gray to paint 3 pictures of the distillery. The 3 paintings were then turned into both labels and a series of limited edition prints. 
This bottling has the still pictured on the label
There are 1700 bottles with each label released.

NAME: Blanton's - Special Reserve Barrel #521
DESCRIPTION:
Blanton's Single Barrel Special Reserve is a lower strength single barrel bourbon.  Dumped Date. Each bottle is hand-filled, hand-labelled, hand-sealed and individually numbered. 80 Proof.
This bottling has come from rick 20 and barrel 521.  
This is bottle number 293.

NAME: 3 Isles - Classic Pillage - Final Release
DESCRIPTION:
The is the series of Pillaged Malts and it has been said that this will never be repeated!
The 3 Isles Classic Pillage is a vatting of bottles from Jura, Ardbeg and Tobermory
This challenge was completed on 8/9/10.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Years Old - Single Cask Series Aberdeen Airport #3631
DESCRIPTION: This Highland Park Single Cask Edition was bottled in 2018 exclusively for Aberdeen International Airport and World of Whiskies.  With just 610 bottles available, the 12-year-old single malt whisky is drawn from an intriguing mix of American/Spanish oak cask and bottled at a cask strength 64.4% ABV.

NAME: Jura - 18 Year Old One for You
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Isle of Jura Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION:
A small batch and limited release from Jura distillery. This single malt has been matured in American white oak ex-Bourbon barrels.
This single malt has been aged for a minimum of 18 years before bottling.

NAME: Laphroaig - 15 Year Old - 200th Anniversary Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION: This limited release 15-year-old Laphroaig single malt was bottled to commemorate Laphroigs 200th Anniversary.  To mark their bicentenary they brought back their 15-Year-Old for a limited edition release.  Laphroaig 15 Year Old was first released in the 1980s, but it was eventually replaced with the Laphroaig 18 Year Old.

NAME: Waterford - Single Farm Origin -  Bannow Island 1.1 & Bannow Island 1.2
DESCRIPTION: This lot contains 2 x 70cl

NAME: Johnnie Walker - 18 Year Old Gold Label Reserve
DESCRIPTION: This is a blend of over 15 single malts.  Originally, Gold Label was bottled at 18 years and labelled 'The Centenary Blend'.   However, this all changed in 2013, when Gold Label was revamped and replaced by a no-age-statement blend... 'Gold Label Reserve''.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 14 Year OId - Valinch Iain Maclean #1524
DESCRIPTION: An unpeated single malt from Islay and a limited edition single cask. Only 362 bottles came from cask number 1524. Matured for 14 years in a premium French Wine cask this bottle has a picture of the warehouseman Iain Maclean.

NAME: Lagavulin - 11 Year Old  - Offerman Edition
DESCRIPTION:
Lagavulin Offerman Edition is an 11-Year-Old, limited edition released as a tribute to Nick Offerman. Nick Offerman was known for his woodcraft skills and putting it to good use building his own boats. 
Lagavulin chose this dram for a reason, it comes from American white oak casks, a direct reflection of his passion.

NAME: Bunnahabhain - 9 Year Old Lady of the Glen 2010
DESCRIPTION:
Selected and bottled by independent bottler Hannah Whisky Merchants - Lady of the Glen from Scotland.  Distilled in November 2010 and matured in Oloroso sherry hogshead  901203 until January 2020, when it was bottled at the cask strength of 66.7% ABV. This is one of just 325 bottles produced. 
This is bottle number 110.

NAME: Lagavulin - 11 Year Old  - Offerman Edition
DESCRIPTION:
Lagavulin Offerman Edition is an 11-Year-Old, limited edition released as a tribute to Nick Offerman. Nick Offerman was known for his woodcraft skills and putting it to good use building his own boats. 
Lagavulin chose this dram for a reason, it comes from American white oak casks, a direct reflection of his passion.

NAME: Macallan - 12 Year Old - Sherry Oak  - Limited Edition Tin
DESCRIPTION: This limited-edition Macallan 12 year old was exclusively matured in sherry seasoned oak casks, from Jerez.  It comes in a metal presentation tin featuring an image of a barrel shot by Magnum photographer Alex Soth.

NAME: Benrinnes - 17 Year Old 2000 - Great Ocean Liners - Jack Wiebers
DESCRIPTION: This is a limited edition, 17-year-old Benrinens single cask bottling of just 119 bottles.  Filled from bourbon cask 072a, selected by Jack Wiebers, this bottling was released to celebrate the Great Ocean Liners at the Whiskey Fair in April 2018 in Limburg.

NAME: Adelphi - 12 Year Old 2007 - Breath Of The Highlands
DESCRIPTION: A mysterious Highland single cask whisky from Adelphi's Breath Of series.  Distilled in 2007,  it spent 12 years in a single refill Pedro Ximénez sherry butt and was bottled 12 years later in 2019, this is one of just only 556 bottles produced.

NAME: Aberlour - 20 Year Old Distillery Reserve Collection #9057
DESCRIPTION:
This Aberlour 20 Year Old single malt was released as part of the Distillery Reserve Collection. These single cask bottlings were exclusively available at Chivas Brothers distilleries.
Aged for 20 years in cask Number 9057 this first fill sherry was eventually bottled on the 19th of July 2018. Bottled at cask strength. 
Only 1056 bottles were produced from this cask.

NAME: Highland Park - 18 Year Old (Signed Limited Edition)
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Parks last batch of the 18 Year Old single malt before the new packaging of the 18 Year Old Viking Pride.
756 bottles were hand signed by Whisky Makers Max McFarlane and Gordon Motion.

NAME: Aultmore - 18 Year Old 2000 - Adelphi #571/573
DESCRIPTION: One of only 480 bottles, this Aultomore was distilled in 2000,  matured in refill sherry casks 571 and 573.  The casks were bottled by Adelphi in 2018, at the natural cask strength of 55% ABV without additional colouring or chill-filtration.

NAME: Rémy Martin - X.O Excellence
DESCRIPTION: X.O Excellence by Remy Martin is an exceptional Fine Champagne Cognac with a unique aromatic richness. This bottling has been made with 2 of the most prestigious curs of Cognac.

NAME: Longrow - Red - 13 Year Old - 2020 Release
DESCRIPTION: This 13-year-old Longrow Red, is a limited edition from Springbank Distillery in Campbeltown. This was matured for 10 years in a mixture of bourbon barrels and refill sherry hogshead followed by 3 years in Chilean Cabernet Sauvignon barrels. There is only 9000 bottles of this Longrow Red cask strength.

NAME: Stagg Jr
DESCRIPTION: Recently added to Buffalo Trace range this 75cl Stagg Junior is 66.15% ABV. This was bottled in the summer of 2019 and is the batch #12.

NAME: Springbank - 10 Year Old (Old Version)
DESCRIPTION:
With lowland whiskies coming into the spotlight of late, this older style Springbank is starting to become more and more collectable.
Every stage of making the whisky, from malting to bottling, is done on-site at Springbank.

NAME: Benrinnes - 11 Year Old - Adelphi
DESCRIPTION:
Distilled at Benrinnes distillery in 2009 and later bottled by Indy bottler Adpelphi from Benrinnes in 2020. 
There are only 321 bottles.

NAME: Waterford - Single Farm Origin - Ballykilcavan 1.1 & Ballykilcavan 1.2
DESCRIPTION: This lot contains 2 x 70cl

NAME: Bimber - Peated Cask - Small Batch #1
DESCRIPTION:
One of only 1750 bottles in the Bimber Peated Cask Batch 1 Small Batch release. It was firstly matured in 1st fill bourbon barrels then finished in casks that previously held Ex-peated Quarter Casks to finish.
The batch number for this bottling is 01/2020 which was bottled on 30th July 2020.
 
This is bottle number 776.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 9 Year Old - 2008 Cask Exploration Valinch #21
DESCRIPTION:
A Port Charlotte 2008 vintage matured for 9 years in first-fill bourbon barrel #3404.  Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 21 Udal Cuain.  One of 330 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.
This is bottle number 169.

NAME: Macallan - 12 Year Old - Sherry Oak  - Limited Edition Tin
DESCRIPTION: This limited-edition Macallan 12 year old was exclusively matured in sherry seasoned oak casks, from Jerez.  It comes in a metal presentation tin featuring an image of a barrel shot by Magnum photographer Alex Soth.

NAME: Craigellachie - 17 Year Old Small Batch
DESCRIPTION:
Found in the village of Aberlour, this distillery is found near the village of Craigellachie at the heart of Speyside. Translating it, it means rocky hill which refers to the cliff that looks over the river Spey.  The distillery was originally built and founded in 1891 by blenders/merchants. The following years were prosperous and ownership was transferred to a gentleman called Peter Mackie who in drove the distillery forward in 1916. Large amounts of the distilleries production is put forward to Dewar's blended whisky, however their official bottlings are becoming much more prevalent.
Released in September 2014, this is one of four releases by Craigellachie alongside the 13, 19 and 23 year old expressions.

NAME: Laphroaig - Cairdeas Madeira Cask - (2016)
DESCRIPTION: Cairdeas, Gaelic for 'friendship', is an annual bottle release by Laphroaig for their Friends of Laphroaig members.  This bottling was originally aged in ex-bourbon barrels before being re-casked in Madeira seasoned traditional hogsheads. It was bottled at 51.6% ABV.

NAME: Craigellachie - 17 Year Old Small Batch
DESCRIPTION:
Found in the village of Aberlour, this distillery is found near the village of Craigellachie at the heart of Speyside. Translating it, it means rocky hill which refers to the cliff that looks over the river Spey.  The distillery was originally built and founded in 1891 by blenders/merchants. The following years were prosperous and ownership was transferred to a gentleman called Peter Mackie who in drove the distillery forward in 1916. Large amounts of the distilleries production is put forward to Dewar's blended whisky, however their official bottlings are becoming much more prevalent.
Released in September 2014, this is one of four releases by Craigellachie alongside the 13, 19 and 23 year old expressions.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask #2966 - Bulgaria
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Bulgaria.  Distilled in 2005, this single malt was matured for 12 years in Refill Hogshead #2966 and bottled at the cask strength of 63% ABV.  With only 318 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Highland Park - 14 Year Old - Single Cask #2118 - Edinburgh Airport and World of Whiskies
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Edinburgh Airport and World Duty Free.  Distilled in 2003, this single malt was matured for 14 years in ex-sherry refill butt #2118 and bottled at a cask strength of 59.9% ABV.  With only 300 bottles available, this is an extremely limited edition.

NAME: Strathmill - 15 Year Old Càrn Mòr 1992
